inn1.comm: nipping back in and he's glanced it comfortably down to the fine-leg boundary, rocked back and closed the face to work it really fine, the fielder in the deep was a little square and four's the result
pushes it a little wide this time, no movement, holds its line and it's just the single
full and wide, hit me ball, too wide actually and he reaches for it to smash it through the covers for another four
down the leg side, did the clip the pads, missed opportunity there, a hint of swing there for Nehra but it was misdirected, should have glanced it fine again but missed out
gets across to a straighter delivery this time, just a hint of swing into the batsman again, driven towards midwicket
length delivery, almost pitched up on the off, driven firmly back to the bowler
Sreesanth gets welcomed with a boundary as well, poor delivery first up, short and wide and How cracks it hard between point and cover for four
short of a good length on middle and off, rocks onto the back foot, didn't bounce as much as he expected, rocked back and pushed it back to the bowler
pushes it on a good length, gets a stride out and defends him towards point
slightly short of a good length on the off, gets easily on the back foot and defends it into the off side
fullish outside off, reaches forward and drives it towards mid-off
full and wide, reaches forward to crack it hard through cover, gets a thick outside edge towards third man, just the single

appeal for lbw, close call, landed around leg stump and moved towards middle to rap him on the pads as he walked across to flick it through the leg side, looked out but th eumpire thought it pitched outside, lucky escape for the batsman, Hazare the umpire
left him this time, fullish outside off and he shoulders arms to leave that be
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it towards mid-on
fullish on the pads, tries to flick it square but is struck on the pads, they steal a leg bye
full on the off, lands full and it's driven straight to mid-off, nicely timed but straight to the fielder
just short of a good length on the off, gets back and pushes it towards cover

given out caught-behind, fullish delivery outside off, How drove at it inside the line, it moved away just a hint right at the last moment, a faint nick and Nigel Llong, the umpire, had no doubts whatsoever, India strike early
fullish outside off again, almost identical delivery to the previous one, like How Williamson didn't push at it, just played forward and it just escaped the outside edge
pushes it on a good length, defended calmly into the off side
shortish on the off, just opens the face a hint and guides it down to third man for a single
back of a length on the off, gets back, is nicely behind it, and drops it into the off side
lands on a good lenght on the off, played it towards cover
just eased through the off side between cover and mid-off for a couple of runs
short of a good length and out comes his favourite back-foot punch, straight to extra cover though
attempted bouncer gone bad, short on middle and Williamson deals with it with ease, rocks back and pulls it away through square leg for a handsome boundary
trying to tempt him with a bit of width, holds its line this time, leaves it alone
short ball outside leg stump, mistimes a pull down to fine leg, Sreesanth fumbles but just the single there
good length ball on middle and it's driven back stylishly to the bowler
fullish this time, presents the full face while driving it to Gambhir at mid-off
swing, a little bit of swing, hits a length just outside off and he shoulders arms to leave it alone
square-driven but straight to point, pitching it up and opens the face just slightly while playing it
angling it in towards middle this time, pushed it towards mid-on
full on the off, driving length and he does what the ball demands, but straight to mid-off again
pitched up on middle and leg, moves across and defends it towards midwicket
bowls it on a good length on the off, gets across just a hint and taps it in front of cover
slides it wide of off stump, good length and angling away, leaves it alone
run-out appeal, defended into the off side and Guptill is determined to steal a single, Raina picks it up from cover, dives forward and lets out an accurate throw but Guptill was well in
in the channel outside off, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length, punched off the back foot to mid-off
back of a length on middle, gets back and bunts it into the leg side
angling in and he closes the face a touch too early, gets the outside edge to third man, Sreesanth has something to say to his opponent
stood on the crease, stood tall and punched it towards cover
fullish on the off, pushed it towards cover with a big stride
gets half-forward and punches it towards mid-off, thinks of a single but it's not there
moved well across, Sreesanth thought he missed out on something there, was a straight ball that was driven comfortably to mid-on
bowling it on the pads and it's turned to square leg where there is a misfield and a resultant run
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and pats it back towards the bowler

valiant effort by Sreesanth in the deep but it yields nothing, short and Kane Williamson, on the front foot, jabs it past square leg, Ashwin gives chase, Sreesanth runs from fine leg, neither can get to it
nipped back in from a good length on middle, tried to play it into the leg side, was struck on the thighs, an appeal from Nehra but it was too high
the outfield is pacy, came onto him nicely, punched it firmly past mid-on with a slight leap and it had enough to roll over the boundary, nicely timed
short of a good length outside off, cracked straight to point
Munaf does well, pitched up and it's driven hard down the ground, he dives full length to his left at mid-on to save a few runs, not quite a Ben Johnson is Munaf but he did well there
back of a length, rocks back and pushes it into the off side
good length on the off, defended towards cover
lucky again is Mr Guptill, pitched up and he took the aerial route, trying to clear mid-on, managed to do so but only just, took the bottom of the bat and just evaded Munaf
slower one on middle and leg, turns the face and plays it wide of square leg into the deep for a couple of runs

the ball stopped on him there and moved away, Guptill was flummoxed and almost paid the price, pushed it at, it came off the high end of the blade and lobbed up just wide of the diving Yusuf Pathan at mid-off, three more lucky runs
long-off in place, fullish and it';s driven to that man for a single
a bit of width and slashes it down to third man for a single
played away into the off side towards cover
pushed in front of mid-off to complete another quick single
short and he'll feel he missed out there, dragged it straight to midwicket
good lenght on middle, turned past midwicket for another quick single
angling it on middle, full, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
struck hard back towards the bowler, Sreesanth tries to stop it and hurts his right hand, nothing serious
shortish on middle, opens the face and taps it wide of point for one more
short outside off and it's pulled straight towards deep square leg, did a good job keeping it down
another slower one, just 61.8mph this time, tickled behind square leg for a single, back of the hand ball that
beautifully driven, lovely timing, pitched up on middle and he presents the full face to beat the bowler and the two fielders in the V, elegantly done
short of a good length on the off, pushed off the back foot just wide of extra cover, Raina does well diving to his right to prevent the single
run-out chance, Yusuf misses one, got to him at a good height at mid-on and they were trying a single, he took aim and didn't miss by much, Williamson survives
pushes it back to the bowler
again, it's pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
eased into the off side towards cover
pushed away into the leg side off the back foot
bowls it flat in towards middle and leg, whipped away behind square for one more
fullish on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
tosses it up, draws him forward, leans forward and plays it back to Ashwin
lands short on leg stump and turns down, it's a wide down the leg side
pitched up on the off, drilled down the ground towards long-on for a single
sliding on the pads there, it's flicked down towards fine leg for just one
short of a good length on the off, punched towards long-off for a single
driven with a full face towards mid-on, off the meat but to the fielder again
punched in the direction of mid-off again, off the back foot but can't quite beat the infield
drove it much straighter this time, full on middle, mid-on does well, yusuf it is, diving full length to his left to prevent a couple of runs
full outsid off, driven towards long-off for a single to keep strike
tosses it up and draws him forward, plays it back to the bowler
slightly short on middle, punched off the back foot to midwicket
good amount of turn for the bowler, turning in from outside off, defended on the pitch
fullish delivery on the pads, tickled down towards deep backward square leg for a single
flighted on the off, steps forward to the pitch and plays it back to the bowler
pitched up and it's driven down to long-on to raise the 50-stand

it's bowled him, nipped back in and got him through the gate, landed on a good length, Williamson was drawn forward and he tried to drive it on the up, missed and it came back in to knock off the bail on the off stump, superb stuff
lands on a good length, pushes it firmly to mid-off
gets front and across and defends it to mid-off
fullish on the off, pushes it towards mid-off again
bowls it on a good length, gets well across and turns it past midwicket for a single
slides it down the leg side this time, tries to get his bat to it but cannot connect
slower delivery and doesn't bounce at all, he tries to cut but that zips under his bat to the keeper on the third bounce
goes for the sweep, didn't turn in much and was struck on the pads but outside the line
fullish on middle, defended it towards midwicket
turning in from a good length outside off, drops it into the off side in front of point
pitched up on the off, driven back firmly to the bowler along the pitch
shortish on middle, rocks back and punches it to midwicket
the carrom ball, gets back and plays it towards midwicket again
fullish on the off, defended in the direction of cover
pushed it in the direction of midwicket and scampers for a quick single
pitched up and it's pushed through into the off side
lands on a length, dabs it towards extra cover
a thickish outside edge but a safe one, wide of the diving keeper down to third man for a single
down the leg side this time and it's a free run gifted
pitched up on the off and he presses it away
paddles it fine for a couple of runs, fetched it from the off stump
was the carrom ball, waits for it, spots it, dabs it into the off side for a single
fullish on the off, turns it away towards midwicket
short of a good length on middle, turns it into the leg side to square leg
an appalling delivery but not dealt with, long hop bowled short on middle, pulled away wide of deep backward square leg
waits for it to turn in, plays it to the right of point for a single
short of a good length, plenty of width and Guptill misses out, mistimes one just wide of Raina at extra cover and he does a brilliant job diving to his right and saving any runs
fullish outside off, cracked wide of cover for a single
dropped, lands on a length on middle, gets across and he clips it uppishly, Ashwin is positioned perfectly at deep square leg and Ashwin, running in, fails to latch on, a sitter that
and that must hurt, lovely shot, fullish on middle, driven wide of mid-on and midwicket for a boundary to ease the nerves a little
angling in towards middle, pushes it back to the bowler
short, long hop, pulled away to long leg for a single
short on the off, slapped off the back foot to long-on for a single
angling it down the leg side, called a wide, no turn there for Yuvraj
firing it on middle, pushed away to midwicket
another wide down the leg side, there have been several of them today, another run given away
short on middle, gets back and punches it to midwicket
gave it a bit of air, fullish on the off, gets across and pushes it into the leg side

short, too short, and it's dealt with, caught the length early and he rocked back to pull it over deep midwicket for a flat six, the fielder there was several yards in though he would not have been able to get to it even if he'd been all the way back
pitched up on the off, driven towards long-off for a single
slightly uppish but Munaf can't get to it, lands short as it is played back towards him, he ends up palming it off into the off side, conceding a single
driven on the up through cover into the deep for a single
targeting the pads and it's flicked away to deep square leg for one more
short of a good length, goes for the cut, gets an inside edge towards the keeper
lands on a good length, driven on the up but extra cover prevents the single
kept a little low and he was all the way back in the crease, turned away past midwicket for a single
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it to midwicket
tossed up, driven back hard down the pitch and into the stumps at the non-striker's end, no contact made by Yuvraj
tossed up, angling in towards middle, defended down the pitch
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
flighted on the off, pushed through to extra cover

and he strikes immediately, pitched up and out comes the slog-sweep, it's clubbed hard but straight into the hands of deep midwicket where Kohli takes it comfortably, that dropped chance didn't really cost much in the end
fullish outside off, reaches for it and guides it past point for a single
pitched up on middle, off the mark, driven to long-on for a single
fullish on the off, pushed past the bowler to long-on for a single
100 up for New Zealand, played it past the diving midwicket, one more to long-on
turning in from a good length, paddles it over the circle, no short fine for a single, hard work for a single that
pushed into the off side
played back to the bowler
shortish on middle, gets on the  back foot and punches it to long-on
flighted on the off, driven down to long-off for one more
lands on a good length, presents the full face while playing it to extra cover
flighted on middle, pitched up, down towards long-on for a single
tossed up on the off, driven towards midwicket
short on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on
closes the face on that one to play it to square leg
steps down the track, gets to the pitch and plays it to long-on
kept really low, gets back and knocks it past extra cover for a single
well done Yusuf, driven back down the pitch and he flings himself to his right to save the single
angling in towards middle and leg, defended to extra cover
fires it down the leg side, clips the pads and they get a couple of leg-byes wide of Munaf at deep backward square leg
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot to play it to midwicket
dabbed to midwicket again off the back foot
appeal for lbw, angling it on middle and leg, tries to work it into the leg side, didn't turn, struck him on the back pad but it would have been sliding down, they take a run on the overthrow
fullish on the off, pushed towards cover
turning in from a good length outside off, punched back to the bowler
manages to get it past the bowler this time, a single to long-on
a fraction outside off and he opens the face to play it to short third man
turns him to catch him high on the pads, lobs up and falls short of the keeper
offers the straight bat to play it to the bowler
long-on is the favoured region again as they sneak a single, tight stuff from the Indians this
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to deep cover for a single
fires it full on middle, defends it towards midwicket
tucks it towards square leg to complete a half-century, a couple of lucky shaves for the man but he's worked hard to get to where he is now, eighth fifty
oooh, kept really low and he tried to cut that, got an inside edge that didn't miss the stumps by much
dabs it towards point
the end of another tidy over, pushed back towards the bowler
and Guptill steps up, short, long hop and he rocks back to dispatch it over deep midwicket for a six
and then pinches a single by punching it down to long-on
fullish on middle, driven down the ground to long-on
full outside off, dug out towards extra cover
a bit of sharp turn there, whipped off the pads behind square for a single

beautifully done by Styris, lovely improvisation, waited for it to turn in, was quicker through the air from Yusuf, Styris opened the face at just the right time to place it behind short third man for a boundary, good pressure-relieving over for New Zealand
on middle, pushed towards midwicket
gets forward and defends it with bat close to pad
full on middle, paddled behind square for a single
fires it short on middle, taps it straight to short midwicket
short on middle, punched off the back foot to long-off for a single
another one through the short-fine region for a single
short on the off, swatted down to long-on for a single
short and it's punched back to the bowler
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, punched to long-on for one more
well fielded by kohli at midwicket, struck hard towards him and he stretches to his left to prevent the single
short and wide, cut away to deep point for a single
quite a few runs scored through that V once the field spread out, one more to long-off
knocked off the back foot to midwicket
plays it down into the leg side in front of square leg for a single
pitched up outside off, gets an inside edge onto his pads
presses it away towards point
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
yorker length, quicker through the air, pats it through square leg and does it gently enough to scamper back for the second
driven hard but straight to midwicket
manages to squeeze it past midwicket and get it wide of long-on for a couple of runs
pitched up on leg stump, another single down to long-on
and again, fullish on the off and it's worked past the bowler
just around leg stump, tickles it through square leg for a single to keep strike
shot, made width even before the ball was delivered, Yuvraj dropped it short on middle and Styris caned it through extra cover
fires it quick on middle, Nehra at square leg dived well before it got to him but it was effective, kept them down to just a single
nicely done, dabbed it gently in front of long-on, well paced between the bowler and long-on and they have enough time to come back for the second
and again, pushed it through the vacant midwicket area, no power in it, a calculated couple again
pushed off the front foot wide of cover for a single
well kept by Saha, a horrendous delivery fired down the leg side from yuvraj and Saha did well to get his body behind it, diving to his left

Styris in attacking mode in the Powerplay, that was much slower, flighted, and full, Styris had to find the gap and he did so, smacking it past the diving cover, through the infield, for a boundary, well done
pushed into the leg side for a quick single
drilled down the ground to long-on for one more
short on middle, pushed towards mid-off from the crease

given out caught-behind by Hazare, fires a carrom ball on the off stump and it goes the other way, Guptill tries to crash that through the line, and Saha clasps it, we need to watch the replay again to see if there was an edge but the umpire certainly thought so. In the meantime, Nigel Llong, the leg umpire, has called for the third umpire to adjudicate on an appeal for a stumping but that stands nullified given the main umpire has given it out caught-behind
fullish on the off, defended to extra cover
quicker through the air, turns the face to play it wide of mid-on for a single
lands on a good length, turned away into the leg side
short of a good length, opens the face to play it to third man for a single
short one on middle and off, punched down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on middle and leg, tries to whip it square, caught the pad and they sneaked in a run
floats it on middle and off, defended it back to the bowler
driven down the ground to long-off for a single
driven down to long-on for a single
flighted on middle, swept down to deep square leg for a single
flighted on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
on middle and leg, swept towards deep backward square leg for a single
Vettori shapes up to play the pull but doesn't time it as well as he would have liked, gets to deep midwicket for a single
short on middle, pulled away through square leg, Munaf runs across and keeps them down to two, almost conceded four with a fumble but managed to recover
on leg stump, tickled towards fine leg for a single
full outside off, moved well across to flick it fine, was struck on the pads but outside the line, and he got an inside edge
found the gap, attempted that shot the previous delivery and it didn';t come off, it did this time, full on leg stump and it's flicked between fine leg and deep square leg for a boundary
short of a good length on middle, pushed towards deep midwicket to keep the strike
tries the reverse-sweep, is caught on the glove, gets a single behind point
fetched it from outside off, was full and he freed his arms, slog-sweeping it wide of long-on, was powerfully struck
shortish outside off and kept a little low as he tried to cut that square
attempts the cut again and gets the desired result even though that wasn't the intended direction, gets a thick outside edge behind point for four more
slashed through point for a couple of runs into the deep
Raina does brilliantly at extra cover, diving full length to his right to prevent the single
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, taps it back down on the pitch
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
seized the length early, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it to extra cover
appeal for lbw, given as runs, slower ball pitching outside leg, Styris wanted to send it into the stands over deep midwicket, got an inside edge onto the pads
full on the off, dug out to mid-off, quiet over form Nehra, good work in these dying stages of the innings
superbly done, found the gap, was tossed up and he charged out to get to the pitch, lofted it between long-off and deep cover for a one bounce four
swept square for a single
fifty for Styris, flicked away through square leg, a good fluent innings that has put his team on course for a competitive score here
driven back to the bowler
stopped in his delivery stride just to get an indication of what the batsman was upto and then bowled the conventional offspinner, defended into the off side
struck wide of long-off for a single to keep strike and raise the 200
slower one bowled short outside off, swings hard but misses
Vettori is finding the gaps with ease, slower one again, short outside off and it's pulled away wide of deep midwicket for four more
nicely done, full and wide and instead of playing it in front of the wicket, vettori slyly opens the face to guide it past Saha to the third-man boundary, New Zealand are stepping up well
eased through the covers in the deep for a single
yorker on middle, on of those rare ones today, dug out wide of midwicket for a single
fullish outside off, mistimes a drive back to the bowler
Styris raises the 50-stand with a powerful swipe over deepmidwicket, charged out of the crease and smashed Ashwin into the crowd
played towards point
saw him come down and held back the length, turned in and he fended it away into the leg side
short outside off, makes room to crack him over extra cover, gets a thick outside edge in front of point, quick single
the reverse sweep but straight to short third man, just the single
slightly short on leg, pushed to midwicket and sneaks a quick single to keep strike

strikes immediately, Styris had made his mind up, made room to that  ball and tried to swat it over midwicket, miscued it, it took the top edge and Saha took it comfortably after running a few yards to his left
He had taken a wicket off the second ball in that game as well and he repeats that feat here, Vettori moves way across to whip that fine, misses and the leg stump takes a hammering
no damage done, aiming for the blockhole, full on the off, dug out past the bowler towards long-off for a single
bowls it on a good lenght on middle, defended cautiously back to the bowler, Sreesanth dives full length to his right
short of a good lengh, guided to the left of point for a quick single
short of a good length, the slower one, moves back to dab it past the keeper, misses, the end of an excellent over, plans for 260 could be laid to rest now
tossed up on leg and middle, goes for the sweep, misses, landed outside leg
shortish outside off, moves back and slashes it hard past point, the fielder dives but doesn't stand a chance
low full toss on middle, driven down to long-on for a single
worked away wide of midwicket for a single
another attempt at the sweep, is struck on the pads
fullish on leg stump, flicked over the infield for a couple into the deep wide of midwicket
quick single as he gets an inside edge onto the pads and the ball drops dead into the off side
chips it into the off side and lands short of long-off, just the single
short and that's murdered, stands tall and wallops him over midwicket for a fiery one bounce four, a nod of appreciation from the bowler
dabs it just behind point for a single this time
yorker just outside off, dug out behind point for a quick single
angling in towards middle, played into the leg side in front of square leg for a single
short delivery on middle, tries to pull it square, is struck in the ribcage, just the single
length delivery outside off and he swings hard but misses
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover, it was actually a catch that was dropped, a simple chance put down by Yuvraj, who also missed the run-out
full and wide, moves away to smack it over extra cover, Kohli covers good ground to palm it back in but they've taken three in the meantime
appeal for run-out, swing and a miss, Saha fumbles behind the stumps but recovers well to throw down the stumps at the striker's end and catch the batsman short, Nathan McCullum is gone
fullish on middle and leg, pushed wide of extra cover for a single to keep strike
gifts him a short ball outside off, Mills makes room and slashes him over point for a boundary
nicely done, full and wide, makes room to steer it wide of third man for two more, 250 up for New Zealand now
full and wide, makes room to squeeze it out into the off side again, misses
meaty blow, 260 back on the cards, short of a good length, comes down the track a couple of steps and hammers that over long-off for a massive six

yorker and Sreesanth is obviously quite animated as Mills loses his leg stump, but only after 12 runs have been taken off the over. Referral called by the umpire who isn't sure if that was a no-ball, and replays show Sreesanth, only just about, had a part of his foot behind the line
full outside off, makes room to slice it over cover for a couple of runs

inn2.comm: lands on a good length on middle and leg, turned towards square leg
bowls it on a good length on middle and leg, turned in and Vijay played inside the line to that one, a bit of an outside edge but no damage done
length ball on the off, went straight on, pushed towards cover
waited for it to turn in, rocked back and turned it past midwicket for a single
short one outside off, chopped towards point and there's a fumble that allows him to get off the mark
flighted on leg stump, driven back on the bounce to the bowler
quick single in the leg side, just knocked in front of square leg and Vijay scampered down the track to make it in time
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and defends it towards cover
short of a good length on the off, punched it straight to mid-off
back of a length on the off, is nicely behind that one and defends it on the pitch
lands on a good length on middle and off, presents the full face back to the bowler
angling in towards middle, turned past midwicket for a single
floating it on leg stump, pushed towards midwicket
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and whips it just wide of square leg, the ever-sharp Guptill is there and returns a throw to the keeper but Gambhir has made it
angling in towards leg stump, tries to work it square, strikes him high on the pads
quicker through the air, length ball on leg stump and he tries to close the face but is struck on the pads
shortish on the off, waits for it to turn away, chops it towards point
ooh, playing for the turn and it didn't, went straight on, rocked back to punch it through extra cover, missed and so did Hopkins behind the stumps
shortish outside off, stands tall and punches it through trhe covers for a couple of runs, Sunil Gavaskar on TV commentary is not happy they didn't run for the third
length ball outside off, keeps low, and he shoulders arms to let it through

some swing there for Mills, full outside off, dug out towards mid-on and they complete a quick single, a horrific throw from Nathan McCullum and Hopkins does superbly to prevent any damage, diving to his left
fortunate is Gambhir, good lenght and he tries to drive that on the up through mid-off, gets an inside edge to the fine-leg boundary
short of a good lenght outside off, dabbed towards gully
nipped back in just a hint from a good lenght outside off, defended it back to the bowler
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the leg side
flighted on middle and Gambhir gives him the charge, comes down the track and drives it uppishly inside out wide of mid-off, a diving mid-off that is, for a boundary
appeal for stumping, Gambhir goes for the sweep, it turns away and beats the swing of the bat, Hopkins takes the bails off but replays show Gambhir has made it back
well fielded at mid-off, comes down the track and tries to repeat that uppish drive past mid-off but McKay there does well, palming it back to keep them to one
short on middle, gets on the back foot and works it to midwicket
smacked, a bit of width and he cashes in, makes room and slashes it through point for a boundary
good length ball outside off, defended towards point
width again and he tries to cream that on the up through the off side, the bat turns in his hand at the last moment
perfects the shot this time, gets forward and eases it  between extra cover and mid-off for a boundary, beautifully timed
short of a good length on middle and leg, turned past square leg for a single
shortish outside off, cut behind point
tossed up on the off, reaches forward to push it back to the bowler
short of a good length, gets back and punches it back down the pitch
full toss and he charges down but only manages to play it back to the bowler
full and wide and he drives it uppishly again, there is an extra cover in place and he dives valiantly but he can't get to that, four more
shortish outside off, runs it down towards third man for a single
Vijay's lucky, looking tentative is the opener, fullish and he tries to drive through the line, it nips back in to take the inside edge, one run to fine leg
not the first time it has happened with Gambhir this innings, full and way wide, there to drive and he reaches for it, gets an inside edge to the fine-leg boundary
bowled on a good length on the off, defended towards point
slower one, short outside off, guides it wide of third man and has enough time to run back for the second
fullish on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, closes the face to turn it wide of square leg for a single
keeps it flat, on middle, turning toward leg, pushed to mid-on
fires it quick on middle, worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
flat on middle, defends it watchfully back down the pitch
slightly down the leg side, gently taps it into the leg side, McKay takes a while to get to it from fine leg and they've run two easily
lovely timing, short of a good lenght and it's just punched past extra cover, it races away towards the ropes and Vettori drags it back but they've taken three
short of a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler
pushes it on a good length, gets across and drives it towards midwicket
nice use of the wrists, that races away for a boundary, short of a good length on middle and he turns it past square leg, Guptill gave chase but he had no chance
short outside off, mistimes a cut straight to point
inside edge again but onto the pads, trying to force it off the back foot past mid-off
appeal for lbw, turning from middle towards leg, Vijay played across the line to that one, was struck on the pads, could have missed leg, replays show it would just clipped it
worked away off the back foot into the leg side
gets back and turns it past square leg
short on middle and off, punched towards extra cover
looping it on middle, gets front and across and works it to midwicket
driven down the ground towards long-off to keep strike
nicely placed, just a punch between point and cover but Nathan McCullum chases superbly and hauls it back in after diving full stretch forward, three runs
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
shortish on middle, turned in front of midwicket, thinks of a single but wisely decides against it in the end
smacks him on the helmet, banged in short and Vijay was caught by surprise, rose up and decided to duck at the last moment, wrong call and was struck on the grill
fuller, on a good length and he produces a thick outside edge as the batsman tries to turn the face, a single to third man, Gambhir walks down and has a word with his opening partner
some excellent fielding by Southee in the deep keeps them down to just one, a slovely square cut but he slides to his left and returns a strong throw, New Zealand doing brilliantly in the field again
full on the off, sliced it through cover for a single
the offcutter, on middle, pushed down the ground to long-on
around a good length, on leg stump, turned towards midwicket
Gambhir steps up, pitched up and he sensed a chance, moved away and launched him over mid-off
straying on leg stump, pushed towards midwicket, decides against the single
fifty for Gambhir, on the pads and he tickles it fine to come back for the second, his 22nd half-century and his innings has given India a solid start
short of a length outside off, tries to cut, gets an inside edge just past the keeper
good length ball on the off, defended towards cover
doesn't waste the short one, rocks back, waits for it to turn away and smacks it over midwicket for a boundary
good length on the off stump, holds its line, defends it back to the bowler
pushes it back off the front foot
pitched up on the off, driven through towards deep extra cover for a single
fullish delivery on the off stump, pushes it down the ground to long-on, there are overthrows and they scamper back for the second
punched back to the bowler from the crease
pushed to long-on for an easy single
pitched up on the off and it's driven through the line for a single to long-off
slower one bowled full outside off, closes the face to play it to midwicket
slower one bowled on middle, worked away through square leg
round the wicket and appeal for lbw, tries to work it through the leg side, struck on the pads but appeared like it would have mssed leg, hawkeye say sit would have struck leg, hmmm
another appeal for lbw, slowed it up quite a bit, got forward to defend, struck in line but got an inside edge onto the pad
pushed down the ground towards long-off for a single
slightly short outside off, dabs it behind point for a single
floats it full outside off, driven towards long-off for a single
comes down the track and works it to midwicket
short of a good lengh, pushes it down the ground to long-on for a single
angling in towards leg stump, worked behind square for a single
back of a length on the off, stands tall and defends to cover
third man is up and that was bowled down the wrong line, short and wide and he cuts it easily behind point for a boundary
fullish on the off, turns the face to work it to midwicket
on middle and leg, tickled wide of square leg for a single to keep strike
turned off the back foot to square leg
angling in towards leg stump and didn't look like it straightened, appeal for lbw and it would have gone down leg
on middle and off, defended with a big stride

bowled'im, Vijay had not looked at ease at all during his innings, went for the slog-sweep and missed, the rest is history, Vettori has his man, had in trouble on a few occasions and the wicket finally came
shortish on middle and off, gets back and defends it to the bowler
flighted on the off, eased it wide of long-off for a couple of runs
short and wide, cracked towards deep point for a single
pitched up on the off, presents the straight bat to play it to mid-off
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and pushes it to extra cover
short on the off, defends it in front of point
back of a length on the off, defended in front of cover
Kohli takes the risk, there is a gully in place and he goes for it, it's short and wide and he slashes hard, evades gully and third man for a streaky boundary
short of a good length outside off, rocks back and cracks it towards deep cover for a single
good length on the off, pushed it back towards the bowler
shortish outside off, eased off the back foot towards deep point for a single
flighted on the off, comes down the track and lofts it over extra cover for a couple of runs
worked away off the back foot towards square leg for a single
driven towards long-off for a single to raise the 100 for India
angling in from round the wicket, worked away slightly uppishly towards Styris, falls short of him
lands on a good length on the off, defended solidly to cover
slower one bowled full outside off, mistimes a drive but manages to squeeze it past mid-off for a couple of runs
pitched up on the off, elegantly driven but straight to the fielder
hurls it short on the off, gets on top of it and drops it towards point
lands on a good length on the off, pushed it towards mid-off
pushed it full on the off stump, driven towards midwicket
slight blip in scoring here, low full toss on middle, driven straight to midwicket again
good work from McCullum at midwicket, three in a row now, drives to his right to stop that
clipped it through square leg for a single

full on middle, gets forward and pushes it down towards mid-on, missed run-out, Gambhir was trying to get back into the crease at the non-striker's end but his bat got jammed into the ground for a split second and had that been a direct-hit he was gone
slightly short outside off, cuts it towards point
banged in short outside off, gets out of the way, and it's called a wide for height
good length and he deposits it to the midwicket boundary, swings across the line, connects it with the meat and dispatches it to the ropes
short ball down the leg side, Hopkins dives to his right but they've sneaked a run as well, it's given a wide as well
kept a little low, was the slower one, tried to force it past extra cover, mistimed
angling it on the pads, flicked it away towards fine leg for a single
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, pushed between point and cover for a single
ooh, almost, Kohli tries to whip it through midwicket, was short on the off, it appeared to stop on him for a second and he almost scooped it back to the bowler, fell short
on middle and leg, closes the face to turn it to deep midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and leg, works it through midwicket for a couple of runs
lands on a good length on the off, defended into the off side
eased through the off side for a single
turned away into the leg side for one more
short of a good length on middle, punched to midwicket off the back foot
shortish outside off, cracked through to deep cover for a single
bowls it on a good length on the off, pushes it back to the bowler
shortish on middle and leg, flicked away really fine, walks across and clips it elegantly to the fine-leg boundary
useing his wrists well and he's timing them well too, turned away through square leg and the fielder is a touch deep and has to run across a bit, two more
bowls it on a good length on the off, defended towards extra cover
angling in from round the wicket, on middle, gets forward and it turns away to take the leading edge as Gambhir closes the face too early
Gambhir makes room and the bowler chases him, pushes it away into the off side
turns the face to play it straight to midwicket
short and wide, turns away, Gambhir seizes the chance, rocks back and cuts it away behind point for a boundary, his tenth this innings
slaps it down the ground to long-off for a single
big turn for the bowler there, pitched well outside off and in the end was on its way towards middle, kohli had initially shaped up to cut, ended up defending it in the off side

bowls it on a good length on the off, defended in front of point and races for a single, a missed run-out as he didn't ground his bat and jumped to evade the throw, had that been a direct hit he was gone
crunched off the back foot towards point
short of a good length on the off, punched towards extra cover
bowledit on a length on middle, driven through midwicket into the deep for a single
bowls it on a good length on middle, defended solidly back down the pitch
short and wide and there to hit it seemed, Gambhir tried to carve that over the infield in the off side, missed
fetches it from outside off and turns it to midwicket
drags it wide of midwicket this time for a single
big gap in the deep and Gambhir picks it, he's strong in that area and out comes the inside-out shot, comes down the track and lofts it between deep extra cover and long-off, perfectly placed
pushes it down the ground to long-on for a single
waited for it to turn in, punched off the back foot to long-off for a single
straying on the pads slightly, tickles it fine for a couple more, steady progress here by India
nipped back in a hint, pushes it into the leg isde
gets behind it this time and works it past midwicket for a single
misdirected, down the leg side, a wide, a rare extra this innings
back of a length outside off, guided down towards third man for a single
Any series of dot balls has been compensated by boundaries from these two, short on middle and it's pulled handsomely through square leg
superb timing, short of a good length, waits for it and just punches it through point and cover, caressed it through the gap and earned another four
lands on a length on the off, defended towards cover
on middle and leg, turned it past square leg for a single
tossed it up, landed full on the off, pushed it back to the bowler
works it just wide of short fine, Gambhir calls and Kohli responds
shortish on middle, uses the depth of the crease to work it square
Kohli is in fine form, gave it a bit of air did Vettori, Kohli got to the pitch and just crunched it through the line through that narrow gap between mid-off and extra cover
pushes it past the bowler for a single to keep strike
that shot has fetched him a lot of runs, that punch off the back foot just past extra cover, just a single this time
good length outside off, comes down the track and cracks it for a couple in front of deep cover
a lovely pull, trusted the bounce there, rocked back, got on top of that short delivery and pulled it hard past midwicket all along the ground, rolled his wrists over that one, wonderfully executed
taps that in front of point
short of a good length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
pitches it up on the off, driven straight to mid-off
was that dropped? didn't seem like it, tossed up outside off, tried to drive it past cover, didn't turn and went straight through to the keeper who fumbled it
comes down the track and chips it towards long-on
gets a big stride out and defends it into the leg side
short of a good length outside off, cuts it past point for a single
not much turn again though Gambhir was playing for it, looking to open the face but can't connect
short on the off, turning in, slaps it hard but straight to extra cover
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and defends it into the off side
slightly short, knocks it towards midwicket this time
just a fraction outside off, dabs it towards point
gets across and drives it towards deep midwicket for a single
Gambhir looks very confident, came down the track to that short ball, adjusted well and guided it wide of third man to come back for the second
bowled full on the off, driven straight to extra cover
shortish on the off, gets back and pushes it to the bowler
flighted outside off, driven straight to extra cover
closes the face on that one and plays it to midwicket
worked away past midwicket, the fielder in the deep takes a while to get around to it, two more
two more, it's pitched up outside off, drilled past extra cover for a brace
fullish on middle, driven back to the bowler
short of a good length, run down to third man for a single

four more, second time he's bisected that gap with the pull, hurled it short and he pulled it between deep square leg and fine leg to raise a half-century, following up on a match-winning ton in the first game
short, mistimes a pull past midwicket for a single
slower one on middle, drops it in front of point, excellent running, Kohli calls, he's the man running to the danger end and completes the single in time
drives it on the up but it's straight to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, whips it down to fine leg for a single
flighted on the off, cracked towards long-on for a single to raise the 100-run stand
angling in towards middle, defended just wide of point for a single
tossed up, just wide, tries to crash it through the covers but gets a thick outside edge towards short third
kept low as it turned in, defended back down the pitch, a bit of a struggle to do it but he managed it
short on middle, pulled straight towards deep midwicket for a single
pitched up on the off, eased past extra cover for a single
Gambhir, in the meantime, eases to his eighth ODI century, length ball on middle and he picks it well, dispatching it over midwicket for a boundary, his team is on a roll here
upper cut, played down towards third man for a single
shot of the day, short of a good length, rocked back and just punched it down the ground, came off the meat, mid-on had no chance, it was all timing
four more, again, no risk involved, just a wonderful use of the wrists, on middle and off and he whipped it through midwicket, mid-on gives chase again but it's pointless

smart work by Taylor at midwicket, short and it seemed it was on its way for the fourth boundary of the over, pulled hard but Taylor leapt, palmed it with one hand and clasped it with both on its way down to complete a neat catch, no third straight ton for Kohli though he looked good to get it
short of a good length outside off, chops it into the off side
wide down the leg side, slides it from round the wicket, spontaneous appeal from the bowler and keeper for a caught-behind, Gambhir shakes his head
driven down towards long-on for a single
good length on the off, Yuvraj watchfully defends it into the off side
slightly short, cracks it towards deep cover for a single
punched towards deep cover for a single
Yuvraj doesn't wait, he's eager to finish this off soon, flighted on middle, reached forward and slog-swept it over deep midwicket for a flat six
two more, pushed through midwicket for a couple more
on middle and leg, dabs it into the leg side in front of square leg for a couple of runs
short and wide, cut away past point and Southee in the deep dives full length to his right to keep them down to a couple
width again and Gambhir doesn't forgive him this time, slashed away behind point, third man had absolutely no chance
poor stuff from McKay here, this is shorter and wider, a gift ball that Gambhir accepts gleefully, tonking it over point for another four
delicately done this time, good length but the width is still there, Gambhir waited for it and opened the face at the right time to squeeze it behind point and beat third man to the ropes
short of a good lenght and runs it down to third man for a single this time
short on middle, made room and chopped it to point
dominating the innings is Gambhir, no problems picking the gaps at all, angling in from round the wicket, on middle and he just flicks it disdainfully past deep square leg
punched off the back foot to extra cover
short of a good length on middle, turned away wide of deep square leg for a couple more runs
inside edge, short and wide, missed out there, onto his pads and then into the ground and then into Hopkins's gloves and out of them
short of a good length outside off, punched past extra cover for two more runs
on middle and leg, turned past square leg for a single
pitched up on the off, driven straight to extra cover
slightly short on middle, turned in front of square leg for a single
driven down towards long-off for a single
edged and four, landed on a good length and then turned away, tried to ease it through the off side, got a thick edge to the third-man boundary, Hopkins had no chance
pushed through to long-off to keep the strike
short and wide, mistimes a cut to point
on a good length on the off, pushed straight to extra cover
back of a length on middle, punched to extra cover
tries to force it through the in-field on the off side, straight to point though
whipped through square leg for an easy single
angling in on middle, gets across and turns it to midwicket
pushed it through extra cover into the deep for a single
comes down the track and drives it straight back to the bowler
flighted, full on the off and he slog-sweeps it hard through midwicket for a boundary, didn't time it too well but it had enough power
turned into the leg side for a single
turning away from a good lenght, left alone
driven through the line to long-off for a single
wide down the leg side, and that's a win as they've taken two after hopkins fumbled behind the stumps, three runs to the total and India take a 2-0 lead
